column9: I take this medication for migraine pain relief and sleep disorder. I first started taking 25mg. My doc is wanting to up the dose soon. I can't poo, and I get pretty tired easily during the day. I take classes in the evening so my body is like, "okay I have had enough, time for sleep" during class. Overall, I have been pretty happy with this medication. And if given the chance, without giving up so quickly, I think a lot of people will be too. It has been around for a very long time.
